text: aur (tumhaare paas) kuchh heela karane vaale gavaar dehaatee (bhee) aa maujadoo hue taaki unako bhee (peechhe rah jaane kee) ijaazat dee jae aur jin logon ne khuda aur usake rasool se jhooth kaha tha vah (ghar mein) baith rahe (aae tak nahin) unamen se jin logon ne kufr ekhteyaar kiya anaqareeb hee un par dardanaak azaab aa pahunchega
